DOC.brief_summary: A clinical study investigate pharmacokinetics , metabolomics biomarker healthy elderly subject ursodeoxycholic acid administration
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Investigate Pharmacokinetics , Metabolomics Biomarker Elderly After UDCA Administration
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize , open-label , two-treatment , one-sequence , multiple drug administration design . The purpose study follow ; To investigate pharmacokinetics , metabolomics biomarker healthy elderly subject ursodeoxycholic acid administration
DOC.criteria: Healthy Subjects age 70 84 year A body mass index ( BMI ) range 18.5 kg/m2 29.9 kg/m2 . Good health base complete medical history , physical examination , vital sign , electrocardiography ( ECG ) , clinical laboratory evaluation . Subjects clinically significant disease cardiovascular , respiratory , renal , endocrinological , hematological , gastrointestinal , neurological ( central nervous system ) , psychiatric disorder malignant tumor Subject judge eligible study participation investigator
